Text: John Paul Chase:  He was a longtime criminal associate of the Karpis-Barker Gang and most notably Baby Face Nelson who later brought him into the John Dillinger gang.
Triplets:<John Paul Chase
2:
Text: John Paul Chase:  FBI Director J. Edgar Hoover once referred to Chase as "a rat with a patriotic-sounding name".
Triplets:<John Paul Chase
3:
<Text: John Paul Chase:  Chase and Nelson continued to rob banks with John Dillinger until Dillinger's death in July 1934.>
